Class SearchAlbumController

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class SearchAlbumController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    SearchAlbumController covers all methods which are needed to run AlbumScene properly.
    The class implements Initializable
    The @FXML tells the compiler that this variable is connected to an FXML-file

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method runs when user presses "Search Album" in main scene. It initializes the class, and fills albumTableView with all albums in Database.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - the URL used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known
        resourceBundle - the ResourceBundle used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized
      • <<<<<<< HEAD

        handleAlbumSearchButtonClicked

        private void handleAlbumSearchButtonClicked()
        This method runs when albumSearchButton is clicked. It will check if the album selected in albumComboBox is equal to any of the album names. If it is, the method will clear the albumOverview, and only add the correct album to the albumOverview.
        If none of the albums have the equivalent name, the method will display an alert.

      • makeAlbumOverview

        private void makeAlbumOverview()
        A method for displaying every album in the Database.
        The display is a VBox with multiple HBoxes, depending on how many albums the Database contains.
        Each albumRow contains up to 3 albumItems.
        If there are no pictures in an album, the albumItem displays a default image: imageNotFound, and albumName. If there is a picture the albumItem displays the first image in the album and albumName.

      • handleAlbumResetButtonClicked

        private void handleAlbumResetButtonClicked()
        Method for resetting albumOverview. The method clears albumOverview and runs the method makeAlbumOverview().

      • loadAlbumComboBox

        private void loadAlbumComboBox()
        Method for loading all the albums from database into the album choice box

      • loadAllPicturesFromAlbum

        private void loadAllPicturesFromAlbum​(java.lang.String albumName)
        Method for showing all images in a chosen album. If the album contains zero images, the user will be notified by text in albumOverview.
        Parameters:
        albumName - the albumName that is used to check what album was clicked

        public void handleBackButtonClicked()
